member.name: T:Wask.Lib.SignalR.ChannelEvent
member.summary: A generic object to represent a broadcasted event in our SignalR hubs

member.name: P:Wask.Lib.SignalR.ChannelEvent.ChannelName
member.summary: The name of the channel the event is associated with

member.name: P:Wask.Lib.SignalR.ChannelEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: The date/time that the event was created

member.name: P:Wask.Lib.SignalR.ChannelEvent.Data
member.summary: The data associated with the event

member.name: P:Wask.Lib.SignalR.ChannelEvent.Json
member.summary: A JSON representation of the event data. This is set automatically when the Data property is assigned.

member.name: T:Wask.Lib.SignalR.EventHub
member.summary: A signalR hub that provides channel-based event broadcasting that clients can subscribe to

member.name: M:Wask.Lib.SignalR.AnalyticsController.CreateView(System.String)
member.response: Returns ID of the new view
